snippet: The news of Whitney Houston's death came a few hours before Clive Davis's annual pre-Grammy party at the Beverly Hilton Hotel, where Ms. Houston -- Mr. Davis's greatest success as a record man -- had been a frequent guest and performer.
abstract: The news of Whitney Houston's death came a few hours before Clive Davis's annual pre-Grammy party at the Beverly Hilton Hotel, where Ms. Houston -- Mr. Davis's greatest success as a record man -- had been a frequent guest and performer.

headline.main: Houston's Death Came as Industry Gathered for Grammys
